critique: This document establishes and modifies the rules and regulations for personnel administration within the Executive Branch of the Federal Government. It covers aspects such as responsibilities of the Civil Service Commission, agency responsibilities, appointment procedures, and prohibitions against political activity. There is nothing about immigration in this document. The document seems to be trying to balance power between agencies and the Civil Service Commission. It also includes rules about fair hiring practices. The document does not seem to have a strong ideological tilt.
